Posts.Content: Feb 27, 2011 01:15AM bugsbunny1957 wrote: Hi there, I can certainly relate to what everyone else has shared here. I had my last radiation treatment on November 10, 2010, and although I did not cry so much during those six weeks, I am an emotional wreck on any given day, now. In fact I joined this site, because I was so emotional, and felt like I had nowhere to turn at the time. I am so glad I signed in, reading the posts from you all helps me lots..... Thank you all,
Posts.Title: Radiation and Emotions sheuber MexicoHeather
